mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.title,t1.content,t1.mddName, t1.mddId, t1.authorId, t1.authorName,t1.authorPic,IFNULL(t2.thumbsUpCount,0) AS thumbsUpCount,IFNULL(t3.collectCount,0) AS collectCount, IFNULL(t4.commentCount,0) AS commentCount,t1.coverPic, t1.view FROM (SELECT b.aab101 AS 'id',b.aab102 AS 'title', b.aab112 AS 'content', c.aaa302 AS 'mddName', c.aaa301 AS 'mddId', a.aaa101 AS 'authorId', a.aaa102 AS 'authorName',a.aaa106 AS 'authorPic', b.aab111 AS 'coverPic', b.aab109 AS 'view' FROM aa01 a, ab01 b, aa03 c WHERE b.aaa101=a.aaa101 AND b.aaa301=c.aaa301 AND b.aab103=2 AND ${mdd} GROUP BY id )t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT aad203 AS 'id', count(aad203) AS 'thumbsUpCount' FROM ad02 WHERE aad202=1)t2 ON t1.id=t2.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT aad404 AS 'id', count(aad404) AS 'collectCount' FROM ad04 WHERE aad403=1)t3 ON t1.id=t3.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT aac003 AS 'id', count(aac003) AS 'commentCount' FROM ac00 WHERE aac002=1)t4 ON t1.id=t4.id ORDER BY ${order} LIMIT #{page},#{offset} ;

SELECT aaa101 as 'uid', aaa301 as 'poi', aab102 as 'title', aab104 as 'editTime', aab105 as 'date',aab106 as 'days' ,aab107 as 'money', aab110 as 'content', aab111 as 'topImg', aab103 as 'status' FROM ab01 WHERE aab101=#{nid} ;

SELECT uid, nid, poiId, title, editTIme, date, days, money, content, topImg, userName, userPic, aaa302 as 'poiName', commentCount, starCount, thumbsUpCount, views, aaa305 as 'poiPic', status FROM(SELECT u.aaa101 as 'uid', aab101 as 'nid', note.aaa301 as 'poiId', aab102 as 'title', DATE_FORMAT(aab104,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as 'editTime', aab105 as 'date', aab106 as 'days', aab107 as 'money', aab110 as 'content', aab111 as 'topImg', aaa102 as 'userName', aaa106 as 'userPic', aab109 as 'views', aab103 as 'status' FROM ab01 note, aa01 u WHERE note.aab101=#{nid} AND note.aab103=#{status} AND note.aaa101=u.aaa101) t LEFT JOIN aa03 ON t.poiId=aa03.aaa301 LEFT JOIN (SELECT aac003, count(aac001) AS "commentCount" FROM ac00 WHERE ac00.aac002="1" AND aac003=#{nid} AND aac006=1 GROUP BY aac003) t2 ON t.nid=t2.aac003 LEFT JOIN (SELECT aad404, count(aad401) AS "starCount" FROM ad04 WHERE aad403=1 AND aad404=#{nid} GROUP BY aad404) t3 ON t.nid=t3.aad404 LEFT JOIN (SELECT aad203, count(aad201) AS "thumbsUpCount" FROM ad02 WHERE aad202=1 AND aad203=#{nid} GROUP BY aad203) t4 ON t.nid=t4.aad203

SELECT nid, starId, thumbsUpId, followId FROM(SELECT ${nid} as 'nid', ${uid} as 'uid') t LEFT JOIN(SELECT aad404, aaa101 AS "starId" FROM ad04 WHERE aad403=1 AND aad404=#{nid} AND aaa101=#{myId}) t3 ON t.nid=t3.aad404 LEFT JOIN (SELECT aad203, aaa101 AS "thumbsUpId" FROM ad02 WHERE aad202=1 AND aad203=#{nid} AND aaa101=#{myId}) t4 ON t.nid=t4.aad203 LEFT JOIN (SELECT aad302, aad303 AS 'followId' FROM ad03 WHERE aad302=#{myId} AND aad303=#{uid}) t5 ON t.uid=t5.followId

SELECT nid, title, editTIme, intro, topImg, aaa302 as 'poiName', starCount, thumbsUpCount, views FROM(SELECT aab101 as 'nid', aaa301 as 'poiId', aab102 as 'title', DATE_FORMAT(aab104,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as 'editTime', aab112 as 'intro', aab111 as 'topImg', aab109 as 'views' FROM ab01 WHERE aaa101=#{uid} AND aab103=2 ORDER BY editTime DESC) t LEFT JOIN aa03 ON t.poiId=aa03.aaa301 LEFT JOIN (SELECT aad404, count(aad401) AS "starCount" FROM ad04 WHERE aad403=1 GROUP BY aad404) t3 ON t.nid=t3.aad404 LEFT JOIN (SELECT aad203, count(aad201) AS "thumbsUpCount" FROM ad02 WHERE aad202=1 GROUP BY aad203) t4 ON t.nid=t4.aad203
SELECT aab101 as 'nid', aab102 as 'title', DATE_FORMAT(aab104,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as 'editTime', aab111 as 'topImg' FROM ab01 WHERE aaa101=#{uid} AND (aab103=0 OR aab103=3) ORDER BY editTime DESC ;

mapper.select: SELECT a.aab102 AS 'title', a.aab104 AS 'time', a.aaa101 AS 'authorId', c.aaa102 AS 'authorName', b.aad401 as 'collectId', a.aab101 AS 'nid' FROM ab01 a, ad04 b, aa01 c WHERE a.aab101=b.aad404 AND b.aad403=1 AND a.aaa101=c.aaa101 AND b.aaa101=#{uid};

SELECT t1.nid, t1.nname, t1.npic, t1.cid, t1.cname, t1.time, t1.nintro,IFNULL(t2.commentCount,0) AS 'commentCount', IFNULL(t3.starCount,0) AS 'starCount' FROM (SELECT b.aab101 AS 'nid', b.aab102 AS 'nname', b.aab111 AS 'npic', a.aaa302 AS 'cname', a.aaa301 AS 'cid', b.aab104 AS 'time', b.aab112 AS 'nintro' FROM aa03 a, ab01 b WHERE b.aaa301=a.aaa301 AND b.aab103=2 AND (b.aab102 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR b.aab112 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR a.aaa302 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')))t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT b.aab101 AS 'nid', count(DISTINCT(b.aab101)) AS 'commentCount' FROM ac00 a, ab01 b WHERE a.aac002=1 AND a.aac003=b.aab101 ORDER BY nid)t2 ON t1.nid=t2.nid LEFT JOIN (SELECT b.aab101 AS 'nid', count(DISTINCT(b.aab101)) AS 'starCount' FROM ad04 a, ab01 b WHERE a.aad403=1 AND a.aad404=b.aab101 ORDER BY nid)t3 ON t1.nid=t3.nid ;
